nodes.text: Cynogan was a language. In 10 BBY, the sabacc dealer Saucer Head spoke in Cynogan while shuffling the cards in a sabacc game being played in the Lodge on the planet Vandor.

Cynogan first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was first identified as Cynogan in the video "Every Language in Star Wars" which released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
